comments.comment: <denchmark-link:https://github.com/flyingsalmon>@flyingsalmon</denchmark-link> I can see the following plt.figure() plt.imshow(train_images[0]) plt.colorbar() plt.grid(False) plt.show() Could you remove cache and open again? Thanks!
<denchmark-link:https://github.com/jvishnuvardhan>@jvishnuvardhan</denchmark-link> I'm visiting the Chinese version, and can't see it.

Hi <denchmark-link:https://github.com/flyingsalmon>@flyingsalmon</denchmark-link> , Thanks for the report. We try to keep these up to date. But there is some lag on translation. There's no extra action anyone needs to take for this. This will be fixed when the translation is through the pipeline.
